timeRange.description: If set, only return logs in the provided time range.

limit.description: If set, return at maximum this number of logs.

regex.description: If set, only return logs that match this regular expression.

level.title: Log Level
level.description: LogLevel selects a log level. Pachyderm services only have DEBUG, INFO, and ERROR.

userLogsOnly.description: If true, only return logs from user code, excluding matched log messages only related to internal Pachyderm operations.

LogFilter.title: Log Filter
LogFilter.description: A LogFilter selects which log lines are returned.

from.description: Where in time to start returning logs from; includes logs with this exact timestamp.  If null, starts at the beginning of time.

until.description: Where in time to stop returning logs from; includes logs with this exact timestamp.  If null, ends at the end of time.

offset.description: Offset from which to return results, in the case of multiple entries from the same nanosecond.

logs.TimeRangeLogFilter.title: Time Range Log Filter
logs.TimeRangeLogFilter.description: A TimeRangeLogFilter selects logs within a time range.  Either or both timestamps can be null. If from is after until, logs will be returns in reverse order.  (The first log you see will always be from the "from" time.)
